name: Greedy Gus
slogan: Digging for Wealth, Drowning in Greed!
response: Greed is the guiding force of Greedy Gus, a troll who believes every swamp and cavern holds untapped oil wealth. He’s relentless in his quest to extract it, even if rivers turn to sludge—progress, after all, demands sacrifices! Insurance? Just an irritation he tolerates, because smashing it would take too much effort (and honestly, it’s not worth the hassle). Pharma, though—that’s a different story. It bugs him like an itch he can’t scratch, a pebble in his shoe that won’t go away. But when it comes to crypto, Greedy Gus is all in—like a lovesick troll piling kisses on a boulder!
